title: More Productive Me: A science-based tip each day to overcome procrastination
author: Joel Patrizio

comments.name: Gary Byrne
comments.comment: Subscribed! This is great. It is something I really need to work on. I am constantly setting Dumb goals and need to improve. Thanks for sharing.

title: How Observing My Emotions Helps Me Let Go of Anger and Anxiety
author: Jen Picicci

comments.name: Saucy O'Path
comments.comment: Been in therapy for 25 years and I still deal with rage every day it doesn't matter how much I meditate or observe my emotions I still identify with them and I think that they are valid and give me motivation to act against my enemies. People who don't act out on their anger are cowards and they will always be stepped on and manipulated by other people.

comments.name: Travis Schoenberg
comments.comment: The Universe is funny, I came across this post exactly when I needed it. I love this explanation/idea, thanks so much for sharing!

comments.name: Cathy Coutts
comments.comment: Beautifully expressed. Thank you for sharing this wisdom. Looking forward to putting it into practice.

title: The Magic Daily Practice of Facing Your Fears
author: Leo Babauta

comments.name: MVW Encyclopedia
comments.comment: Super tough stuff to get your mind to learn. Isn't it ironic? Simple but hard to do.

title: I Tried Leonardo Da Vinci’s Daily Routine for a Week: Here Are My Surprising Results
author: Tiny Wonder

comments.name: TzeLin Sam
comments.comment: Interesting. The only thing I’ve been doing from the list is drinking water before breakfast. I guess it’s gonna take a long time for me to be as brilliant as Da Vinci.

comments.name: TzeLin Sam
comments.comment: That was such an endearing read! I'd appreciate your input on my content as well:https://medium.com/@ashrika.mishra13/my-weekly-reset-routine-2ff894714721
